This is a beginners tutorial on how to install new plugins from source. I myself am a beginner, so please note '''THIS IS A DRAFT'''. This tutorial does not work yet!

=== Hardy Heron 8.04 ===
==== Steps to Install Plugins ====
 1. Install needed packages. The packages needed to compile new CompizFusion plugins are not installed by default, so you need to install them through <nowiki>[[SynapticHowto|Synaptic]]</nowiki> or <nowiki>[[AptGetHowTo|apt-get]]</nowiki>.
  a. compizconfig-settings-manager (Plugin manager for Compiz-Fusion)
  a. compiz-dev (Development version of Compiz-Fusion)
  a. compiz-bcop (Compiz-Fusion option code generator)
  a. build-essential (Programming packages needed to compiling)
  a. libtool (Generic library support script)
  a. libglu1-mesa-dev (OpenGL development library)
  a. libxss-dev (X11 screensaver development version)
 1. Download the plugin source code. You can get these from the <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/|git web interface]]</nowiki>. They are in the .tar.gz format.
  a. Go to the plugin page you want, and find the link for the most recent snapshot (<nowiki>[[attachment:CompizFusion_gitweb_screenshot.png|see screenshot]]</nowiki>).
  a. Some of the plugins require the unstable version of Compiz-Fusion (0.7.5), but these are the ones confirmed to work with the version in the repositories (0.7.4).
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/wodor/anaglyph|anaglyph]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=fusion/plugins/atlantis|atlantis]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/metastability/atlantis2|atlantis2]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/smspillaz/fireflies|fireflies]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/warlock/freewins|freewins]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/b0le/photowheel|photowheel]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/pafy/screensaver|screensaver]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=fusion/plugins/snow|snow]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/metastability/snowglobe|snowglobe]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=users/smspillaz/stars|stars]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=fusion/plugins/tile|tile]]</nowiki>
   i. <nowiki>[[http://gitweb.compiz-fusion.org/?p=fusion/plugins/wallpaper|wallpaper]]</nowiki>
 1. Extract the contents to a directory.
  a. You can use <nowiki>[[FileCompression|Archive Manager]]</nowiki> or tar.
 1. Compile the plugin.
  a. Go to the directory in your terminal.
  a. Type "make" and hit Enter.
  a. Type "make install" and hit Enter.
# Restart CompizFusion. You can do this by logging out and logging back in.
# Go to Compiz Config Settings Manager, and enable your new plugin!
